check-even-odd.title: Check Even or Odd
check-even-odd.description: Given an integer n, determine whether it is even or odd. Return 'Even' if the number is even, otherwise return 'Odd'.

examples.explanation: 4 is divisible by 2, so it is even.

sum-of-two-numbers.title: Sum of Two Numbers
sum-of-two-numbers.description: Given two integers, a and b, return their sum.
